message: Recommending VPS for Linux with SSD and only $5/Month.
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: SSD Cloud Server, VPS Server, Simple Cloud Hosting by DigitalOcean
caption: digitalocean.com
description: Deploy an 512MB RAM and 20GB SSD cloud server in 55 seconds for $5/month. Simple, fast, scalable SSD cloud virtual servers.

data.message:
i heard about it.. but it's too cheap.. :D
would u use it for a live website?

yes I'm using it for Node.js apps and Meteor.js (For learning) but My colleague at work is using it for commercial products. the only problem i see is that you can't provide your clients email addresses on the server. they only give you root access and you setup everything from the terminal ;)

ya of course unmanaged.. we get what we pay for.
the good thing is that SSD makes the website super fast. i'll give it a try

yes that's because they give you the server with root account and they are not installing anything. this is not a managed servers so i don't recommend it for any body that doesn;t  know what he is doing. it's for people who knows how to configure and deal with linux servers.
